meanings.definition: A method of printing in which ink is forced through a fine mesh screen onto the surface to be printed.
meanings.sent1: The artist used a silkscreen to create multiple copies of their artwork.
meanings.sent2: I learned how to make a silkscreen in art class.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat walked across the silkscreen, leaving paw prints on the artwork.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like a silkscreen, each one vividly printed on her mind.
meanings.sent5: The silkscreen allowed for precise and detailed prints to be made.

meanings.definition: A screen used in silkscreen printing.
meanings.sent1: The silkscreen was carefully cleaned after each use.
meanings.sent2: The artist stretched the silkscreen tightly over the frame.
meanings.sent3: The silkscreen and the paintbrush had a race to see who could create art faster.
meanings.sent4: The silkscreen stood like a guardian, protecting the artwork from imperfections.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design on the silkscreen was mesmerizing to look at.
